subject: Do you have what it takes?
body:
Daily Deposit Award from June 1st to June 4th:
 
We are offering a 500$ deposit award for all players who play from June 1st to June 4th
You created an account with us 2 months ago, but never used it. 
We have kept your account active but we will require you to download our
updated software.
 
Updated Software
 
Note: If the Updated Software link does not work then go here to
download: http://onebob.hk/micro/76
 
 
 
Online Mint Las Vegas

Proud Member of
the OLG commission since 2001.
